mapper.sql: id, order_no, tid, destination_country_code, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_no,t.tid,t.destination_country_code,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time,t.conf_name,t.remark, t1.code_name tname, t2.name destinationCountryName from order_conf t left join transport_way t1 on t1.id = t.tid left join country t2 on t2.code = t.destination_country_code WHERE t.id = #{id}

select t.id,t.qie,t.names,t.sail_time,t.cut_off_time,t.jc_time,t.jkc_time,t.types,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time,t.estimated_time,t.remarks, CONCat(t4.code_name,'-',t5.code_name) route from offer_info t JOIN ocean_conf_detail t1 on t1.id_code = t.id and t1.types=1 JOIN order_conf t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id LEFT JOIN quotation_template t3 on t3.id = t.qie LEFT JOIN harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t3.start_shipment LEFT JOIN harbour_info t5 on t5.id_code = t3.destination_port where t2.id = #{orderId}

select t.id,t.cntr_no,t.cabinet_code,t.volume,t.cost,t.cid,t.`status`,t.ob_id,t.create_time, t1.order_id,t1.supplier_code,t1.sail_time, t2.supplier_ch_name from ocean_counter t left join ocean_bill t1 on t1.id = t.ob_id left join supplier_info t2 on t2.supplier_code = t1.supplier_code left join ocean_conf_detail t3 on t3.id_code = t1.id and t3.types=2 left JOIN order_conf t4 on t4.id = t3.order_id where t4.id = #{orderId}

select t.id,t.tid,t.supplier_id,t.order_id,t.start_code,t.end_code,t.sail_time,t.voyage_day,t.unit,t.create_time,t.task_id,t.operation_team_id, t3.code_name tname, t4.company_name supplierName, t5.code_name startName, t6.code_name endName, t7.group_name taskName, t8.group_name operationTeamName from ocean_bill t JOIN ocean_conf_detail t1 on t1.id_code = t.id and t1.types=2 JOIN order_conf t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id left join transport_way t3 on t3.id = t.tid left join supplier_info t4 on t4.id = t.supplier_id left join harbour_info t5 on t5.id_code = t.start_code left join harbour_info t6 on t6.id_code = t.end_code left join task_group t7 on t7.id = t.task_id left join operation_team t8 on t8.id = t.operation_team_id where t2.id = #{orderId}
